headlines.description: Liverpool strolled to a comfortable 2-0 win at Brighton on Saturday to close the gap on Premier League leaders Manchester City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool ease past Brighton to close gap at top

headlines.description: Brentford edged closer to survival after a 2-0 win over Burnley in which Christian Eriksen starred and Ivan Toney scored again.
headlines.shortLinkText: Eriksen bags assist as Brentford beat Burnley

headlines.description: Manchester United beat Tottenham Hotspur 3-2 thanks to another magical night from Cristiano Ronaldo.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo hat trick in return as United beat Spurs
